Text:
You really deserve a thanks after (what?) - 6 months, no comments....

Excellent.
Fantastic. Thanks a ton. This is really an exceptional movie. And I am grateful to you that you had uploaded it.

Searching for the newest film of Abbas Kiarostami, I was so lucky to have downloaded this real poem Shirin, which I really enjoyed. So thanks to those who gave it to us. Hopefully you could also give us Certified copy, and thx again
Lenapa
